mapper.select: SELECT t_theme.theme_id, t_theme.theme_title, t_theme.type_id, t_theme.theme_info, t_theme.img_url, t_theme.theme_user_id, t_theme.upload_time, t_theme.watch_number, t_user.user_id, t_user.ID, t_user.username, t_user.`password`, t_user.phone, t_user.email, t_user.user_type_id, t_user.user_img_url, t_user.user_info, t_type.type_id, t_type.type_name, t_user_type.user_type_id, t_user_type.user_type_name FROM t_theme LEFT JOIN t_type ON t_theme.type_id = t_type.type_id LEFT JOIN t_user ON t_theme.theme_user_id = t_user.user_id LEFT JOIN t_user_type ON t_user.user_type_id = t_user_type.user_type_id ORDER BY t_theme.upload_time DESC
